name: Wanderfall Demo (1)
description:
This is the first playable demo for the action adventure game "Wanderfall" 

After starting the project I went on hiatus and have now returned to it with vigor, this demo was put together in the space of roughly 4 days.

~REQUIREMENTS:
~~A "num-pad" or number-pad, using the row of ten numbers will not work
~~~atleast Microsoft Visual C++ 2013 runtime to play
